name: BarcodeEasy
summary: One-line barcode helpers with sane defaults.

examples.title: EXAMPLE 1

members.name: Encode
members.summary: Encodes a barcode value using the specified CodeGlyphX.BarcodeType.
members.signature: static Barcode1D Encode(BarcodeType type, string content)

members.name: RenderPng
members.summary: Renders a barcode as PNG.
members.signature: static byte[] RenderPng(BarcodeType type, string content, BarcodeOptions options)

members.name: RenderSvg
members.summary: Renders a barcode as SVG.
members.signature: static string RenderSvg(BarcodeType type, string content, BarcodeOptions options)

members.summary: Renders a barcode as HTML.
members.signature: static string RenderHtml(BarcodeType type, string content, BarcodeOptions options)
